hl.seg: The Goldman Sachs bank managers will not receive the bonuses in cash

p.seg: Senior executives of the American Bank Goldman Sachs does not receive this year the bonuses in cash.
The entity announced it to react to harsh criticism of their wage practices.
The 30 senior management group receives instead of money, actions that may not be sold at least five years.
In addition, actions may be withdrawn should have taken excessive risks.
According to agency Reuters, Goldman Sachs and became the leader in the effort to unite in Wall Street bonuses with the power in the long term.
I suppose that Wall Street is fully aware of the longest road that must be undertaken, and mentioned former banking investor entity JPMorgan Douglas Elliott.
The problem is in the details, he added.
The Goldman Sachs Bank faced criticism after having removed almost $ 17 billion (nearly 300 billion CZK) for the bonuses, in the first three quarters of this year.
The sum total of the bonuses in the entity for this year, according to Reuters, agency probably exceed, in spite of the measures announced today, the $ 20 billion.
The high bonuses in the banking sector became, with the arrival of the financial crisis, in a sensitive issue in politics.
Great Britain announced on Wednesday that plans to tax at once with a tax of 50 per cent, the bonuses for Bank exceeded 25,000 pounds (approximately 712.000 CZK).
France is also developing similar measures.
